title: Yahoo Hires Tapan Bhat as GM of Finance Vertical, in Tech Veteran’s Return to Company (EXCLUSIVE) - Variety
content: Yahoo Hires Tapan Bhat as GM of Finance Vertical, in Tech Veteran’s Return to Company (EXCLUSIVE)  Variety
description: Yahoo hired Tapan Bhat as president and GM of Yahoo Finance to oversee its financial and business vertical — marking the seasoned exec’s return to the internet media company after more …
